name: Toy Bomber: Endless Bombing Game!
description:
ENDLESS BOMBING FUN!

Blast off with your bomber plane, laying fiery havoc upon the world below. Enjoy vivid and powerful explosions, set off chains of fireworks and avoid enemy cannons as you speed towards a new flight record!

FEATURES:
• Devastating chains of explosions.
• Robust tilt&tap controls.
• High performance 3D visuals.
• Many unlockables in the Toy Shop.
